title: Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.  Guests: Host Emily Wilkins spoke to Congressmen Kevin Hern, a Republican representing Oklahoma's 1st district. Bloomberg's David Westin spoke to Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg.  To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

description:
Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Host Emily Wilkins spoke to Congressmen Kevin Hern, a Republican representing Oklahoma's 1st district. Bloomberg's David Westin spoke to Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
